forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers this afternoon. High 17C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers this afternoon. High 63F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain tapering to a few showers late. High 51F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 44F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 51F. SSE winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 41F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph.
